channel.title: XCo Hack
channel.description:
This is a hack or somewhat a bot written in vb6 for a game called Conquer Online 2.0 i made it for my friend cause he plays... Conquer Online 2.0 is an exe that is part of a game client that u have to download... this program searches throught the open, running memory and get infomation from it.. hence all the text boxes.. also the buttons at the bottom when clicked, trigger the events that are listed.. full source.. rip and repost if u wish.. im not that good at explaining memory reading and hacking but i can do it =) lolz.. this does work, if u wanna test u can download the game client at www.conqueronline.com... http://rapidshare.com/files/25173736/XCoHack.rar.html
edit: no longer works as of this patch on this game (4346) i am gonna keep the source up if anyone wants to look through it..
image links broke... removed..

item.title: XCo Hack
item.dc:creator: @vbcoderx vbcoderx
item.description:
@vbcoderx wrote:

try running the bat file… then running the exe… if that doesn’t work then u need to instal vb6 or the vb6 runtime files

Read full topic

also most of those files are the source code… so if u get an error then just compile it w/ vb6[/quote]
VB6 runtime? Do you mean a 3rd party DLL such as direct x for example?

item.title: XCo Hack
item.dc:creator: @vbcoderx vbcoderx
item.description:
@vbcoderx wrote:

what do u mean… u start it? its an exe… if ur on linux then i don’t think it would work… but u have to have the game downloaded,installed, launched ,and logged in before u run this so it will work properly… this is not for runescape… if u didn’t catch that lolz

Read full topic

item.title: XCo Hack
item.dc:creator: @vbcoderx vbcoderx
item.description:
@vbcoderx wrote:

they can see that cash… and u can lag with the d/c button sometimes and the trade will complete… but they get no cash…, the cyclone is a speedhack… sometimes they can tell if your speedhacking… but… thats the only thing others can see… but the money, lvl ,pk points, and size are client side… everything else it takes from the client… also… the functions at the bottom are memory hacking, it sends a string to the client which is an exe… and u gotta download and install the client and signup for a free acc, then log in and then run this tool… idk if it would work with wine…

Read full topic
